name: No More Pineapples on My Pizza!
name_original: No More Pineapples on My Pizza!
description:
This is my first ever Unity project and was made in 5 hours. Collect cheese and pepperoni while avoiding pineapples. You can shoot pineapples for extra points. The levels are infinite so try to get as far as you can or aim for a highscore! 

*The game can be played with a keyboard or controller.
